references.paper_title: Exact matrix completion via convex optimization
references.reason: This paper is foundational for matrix completion, introducing the use of convex optimization to solve the problem and establishing theoretical guarantees.
This paper extends the results of Candès and Recht to handle noisy observations, which is crucial for real-world applications of matrix completion.

references.paper_title: The power of convex relaxation: Near-optimal matrix completion
references.reason: This paper provides near-optimal sample complexity bounds for matrix completion, showing that it is possible to recover a low-rank matrix from a small number of entries.

references.paper_title: Semi-random sparse recovery in nearly-linear time
references.reason: This paper introduces a new algorithm for sparse recovery in the semi-random setting that achieves nearly-linear time complexity.
This paper presents a fast algorithm for matrix completion in the standard setting that runs in almost-linear time.
